description: Defines scheduling information for service-based items like appointments or reservations.

timeSlots.description: Available time slots for booking this service

available.description: Whether this time slot is still available for booking

price.description: Price for this specific time slot (may vary by time/day)

amount.description: The monetary amount as a string to avoid precision issues

location.description: Where the service is performed (address, room number, etc.)

bookingWindow.description: Constraints on when bookings can be made

advanceNoticeHours.description: Minimum hours notice required for booking

maxAdvanceDays.description: Maximum days in advance bookings can be made

updatedAt.description: When the scheduling information was last updated
